headerOR.title: Donate the things you no longer want

formOR.1: Select what you want to donate:
formOR.2: Select the number of 60l bags you packed your items into:
formOR.3who: Who do you want to help?
formOR.org: Enter the name of the specific organisation (optional)
formOR.4: Provide the address and date of pick-up by the courier
formOR.thanks: Thank you for submitting the form.
formOR.thanks2: We will send you an e-mail with all the information about the collection.
formOR.info1: Complete the details of your items. Thanks to this, we will know who is best to pass them on to.
formOR.info2: Pack all items to be returned in 60l bags. You can find detailed instructions on how to properly pack things HERE.
formOR.info3: If you know who you want to help, you can enter the name of this organization in the search bar. You can also filter organizations by their location or the purpose of their help.
formOR.info4: Provide the address and date of pickup.
